channel.title: mdBook on Raphael Borges
channel.description: Recent content in mdBook on Raphael Borges

item.title: Demystifying Prometheus
item.description: The book Demystifying Prometheus is a crucial component of the Demystifying Prometheus training offered by LINUXtips. I contributed to the development of the ebook version, implementing new features and making corrections to links, texts, and titles. See all my contributions.

item.title: py2rs
item.description: py2rs is a quick reference guide for the Pythonista in process of becoming a Rustacean. In a conversation with Bruno Rocha, I discovered his need to implement an ebook in a project of his that facilitates the migration of Python developers to the Rust language. Since I had already developed the mdbookcli tool, I implemented this tool to generate the book. See all my contributions.

item.title: mdBookCLI
item.description: While working on the implementation of the “Demystifying Prometheus” book from LINUXtips, I noticed the need to simplify the process and address certain limitations in the default mdBook interface. The mdBookCLI introduces multilingual support in a manner distinct from the standard mdBook, generating a homepage that allows users to choose their preferred language. Additionally, it includes extra customizations not available in the default mdBook version.
